articles.title: PSN is Down in America, Europe and Australia Right Now - PlayStation LifeStyle
articles.description: The PSN servers are down on January 17, 2023, in multiple regions worldwide, including North America, Europe, and Australia.
articles.content: The PSN servers are down in America, Europe, and Australia right now, the evening of January 17, 2023, leaving many PS5 gamers unable to sign in to PlayStation Network or to play games online. The of… [+981 chars]

articles.title: SA teams to play in Europe if they earn 'home' Champions Cup semis - News24
articles.description: South African clubs will have to 'host' any potential Champions Cup semi-finals in Europe and not in South Africa, competition organiser EPCR told AFP on Monday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Microsoft's Activision deal reportedly gains support from European developer federation - TrueAchievements
articles.description: The European Games Developer Federation has reportedly weighed in on Microsoft's proposed Activision Blizzard deal, saying it "welcomes" the European Commission's investigation but "supports" the acquisition.
